backend/main.mo: Defines primary actor with hotel, room, booking, user, invite, payment types and initializes storage maps, authorization, and migration.
backend/migration.mo: Provides migration logic converting old actor state from a hotels map to a hotels list while preserving other stored state.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, and root mount target.
frontend/REGRESSION_CHECKLIST.md: Detailed pre-release testing checklist covering auth, hotel browsing, hotel management, admin features, and guest workflows.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router, query client, layout shell, and protected routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin panel card showing placeholder message for not-yet-implemented bookings overview.
frontend/src/components/admin/HotelVisib: Provides an admin table to view hotels and toggle their active and subscription status, using mutation hooks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteToke: Allows admins to generate and manage invite tokens bound to hotel principals, with validation and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied message based on user role and hotel activation status, optionally showing the hotel activation form.
frontend/src/components/auth/GuardErrorS: Shows an error screen when permission checks fail and provides retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/HotelActiva: Validates and consumes invite tokens to activate a hotel account, then refreshes queries and redirects the user.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileComp: Blocks access until a newly authenticated user completes a minimal profile form, then saves it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Protects routes by requiring Internet Identity authentication and presents a login screen when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Guards child components by checking user role, admin status, and optional hotel activation, displaying loading, error, or access‑denied states as needed.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingD: Dialog showing detailed booking information with optional guest principal copying and payment proof indicator.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingF: Placeholder form informing users that booking functionality is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/booking/BookingS: Renders a badge with variant and label based on a booking status value.
frontend/src/components/booking/MyBookin: Displays a placeholder card indicating user booking management is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/common/ImagePrev: Dialog for displaying a large preview of an image with a close button.
frontend/src/components/debug/AuthDiagno: Diagnostic panel showing identity, role, admin status, and hotel activation state for debugging auth issues.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelBooki: Placeholder panel noting that hotel booking management is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelPayme: Placeholder panel indicating hotel payment method management is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelProfi: Form allowing hotel owners to view and update profile and contact details with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RecordStay: Placeholder panel stating that guest stay recording functionality is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomPhotos: Displays room photos with fallback handling for failed images, offering standard or compact gallery layouts with clickable thumbnails.
frontend/src/components/hotel/RoomsPanel: Manages creating and editing hotel rooms, including form handling, image uploads, and rendering room photo previews.
frontend/src/components/hotel/Subscripti: Shows hotel subscription status with badges and alerts, and displays admin contact instructions when activation is required.
Provides the main application layout with top navigation, content container, and footer showing build info.
frontend/src/components/nav/LanguageSele: Renders a simple language dropdown allowing users to switch the app locale to English.
frontend/src/components/nav/TopNav.tsx: Navigation bar handling authentication, role-based links, and access to admin or hotel areas.
frontend/src/components/payments/Contact: Shows admin contact and payment instructions specifically for hotel activation and subscription management.
frontend/src/components/payments/HotelPa: Displays a hotel's payment methods and provides buttons to contact the hotel via WhatsApp or email.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout functions, and persists identity using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for calling backend methods related to user roles, profiles, admin actions, and invite tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomImageUpload.ts: Handles converting image files to data URLs with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/i18n/LocaleContext.tsx: Stores and provides the current UI locale in React context with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountStatusPage.tsx: Displays user account state, admin status, hotel access, and invite token validation/consumption tools.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin dashboard showing panels for managing invite tokens, hotel visibility, and bookings.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHotelsPage.tsx: Displays a browsable grid of hotels with representative photos and handles loading, empty states, and image preview.
frontend/src/pages/GuestAccountPage.tsx: Shows guest account options and provides navigation to bookings, account status, and browsing hotels.
frontend/src/pages/HotelAreaPage.tsx: Provides a hotel management dashboard with tabs for profile, rooms, payments, bookings, and subscriptions, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/HotelDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed hotel info, rooms, photos, and booking form, loading both hotel and room data and handling missing hotels.
frontend/src/pages/MainMenuPage.tsx: Home portal selection page routing users to guest or hotel portals based on authentication and role.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookingsPage.tsx: Shows the user's bookings table with shortcuts to browse hotels and view account status.
frontend/src/types/extended-backend.ts: Defines extended TypeScript interfaces and enums mirroring backend types for hotels, rooms, bookings, payments, and queries.
frontend/src/utils/debugFlags.ts: Provides a helper to check if debug mode is enabled via dev mode or a URL parameter.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Defines currency metadata and utilities for formatting amounts and validating supported currencies.
frontend/src/utils/roomPictures.ts: Handles validation, filtering, and selection of room picture URLs and tracks failed image loads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, backend regressions, and required fixes for hotel profile and room API functionality.
